item.title: How do i make bonus's on a item higher or lower?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

1ts sh3mb0:

how do i make bonus’s on a item higher or lower?

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:2, topic:136784”]item.cfg
You can figure the rest out on your own.[/quote]
I expected sh3mb0 to have a brain, and to use it in this situation.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make bonus's on a item higher or lower?
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

wow man your alot of help ok go to item.cfg and type in the item name and it will bring you to it youll se the name and alot of numbers below it change thoes numbers to what ever you want the bonus to be. item = 6384 Fighter torso good for pking. 150000000 150000000 150000000 0 0 0 70 0 0 0 0 0 0 75 0
